project.Title: Ex-DarkestDungeon
project.ItemDescription:
Mod of Darkest Dungeon for personal using.
个人使用的一些mod整合, 我受不了工坊里左一个补丁右一个补丁
更多信息参见:[url=https://github.com/GalAster/Ex-DarkestDungeon] Github [/url]
[h1] Localizations [/h1]
同时添加了一些汉化, 加载顺序在以下mod之前可以获得汉化:
[h2]英雄汉化[/h2] (现在不包括英雄整合了, 转为好友共享了.) [h1][list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1154908982] The Twilight Knight [/url](暮光骑士) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1342714768] Daughters of the Fours Pack [/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=972549848 ] Ladies of Captivity Spine [/url](被囚禁的公主) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=871605782 ] Valkyrie Mod [/url](女武神) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1090192406] Spirit Monk [/url](灵魂修士) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1360707762] The Condena Class Mod [/url](断罪者) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=955795133 ] Commissar - Class Mod [/url](政委) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1130829365] Marvin Seos Lamia Class Mod [/url](女妖) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1089257023] Marvin Seos Falconer Class Mod [/url](巡林者) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1221097087] Marvin Seos Seraph Class Mod [/url](炽天使) [/list][/h1]
[h2]场景汉化[/h2] (不包含场景整合, 报错是因为有些场景是老版本的.) [h1][list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1193920177] Boss Rush [/url](Boss地牢) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1080076066] The Mountain - New Dungeon [/url](雪山) [/list][/h1]
有的可能汉化不完全, 比如对话没汉化, 但是至少没有蓝字问题了.
[h1]维护到我不玩这个游戏为止.[/h1]
